summary: Encapsulates a paired set of imaging volumes (input and ground‑truth) and provides utilities to load, cache, slice, and preprocess them for segmentation model training.
business_intent: Facilitate the creation and serving of paired image/label datasets from medical imaging files, supporting 3‑D Nifti volumes, axis‑wise slice extraction, optional in‑memory caching, and preprocessing transforms, to streamline segmentation training pipelines.
